typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SchemaName as string,
	TableName as string
}
source(output(
		SALES_CCN as string,
		CNT_NUM as string,
		CR_CNTDT_SEQ as string,
		REQD_DATE as timestamp,
		REQD_TIME as string,
		DOCK as string,
		INBOUND_SEQ as string,
		REL_QTY_TYPE as string,
		CUM_ORDER_QTY as decimal(38,18),
		DIS_ORDER_QTY as decimal(38,18),
		QTY_QUAL as string,
		PER_QUAL as string,
		SHIP_QTY as decimal(38,18),
		COMMIT_QTY as decimal(38,18),
		CANC_QTY as decimal(38,18),
		BO_QTY as decimal(38,18),
		UNIT_PRICE as decimal(38,18),
		LAST_PICK_SEQ as decimal(38,18),
		EST_PARTS_AMT as decimal(38,18),
		EST_TAX_AMT as decimal(38,18),
		SHIP_PARTS_AMT as decimal(38,18),
		SHIP_TAX_AMT as decimal(38,18),
		DEL_ORD_NUM as string,
		DEL_DATE as timestamp,
		DEL_TIME as string,
		SHIP_VAT_AMT as decimal(38,18),
		PRICE_OVERRIDDEN as string,
		NC_REASON as string,
		CANC_REASON as string,
		BOOK_RATE as decimal(38,18),
		BOOT_RATE_DIV as string,
		LAST_SHIP_SEQ as decimal(38,18),
		LAST_PROF_INV as string,
		LAST_PROF_ASN as string,
		EST_BACKLOG_AMT as decimal(38,18),
		SHIP_BACKLOG_AMT as decimal(38,18),
		INBOUND_CNR_ITEM as string,
		INBOUND_CNR_REV as string,
		CONSIGNED_QTY as decimal(38,18),
		CONSIGNMENT_LOC as string,
		CONSIGNMENT_BIN as string,
		USER_ALPHA1 as string,
		USER_ALPHA2 as string,
		USER_ALPHA3 as string,
		USER_NUM1 as decimal(38,18),
		USER_NUM2 as decimal(38,18),
		USER_NUM3 as decimal(38,18),
		USER_DATE as timestamp,
		USER_TIME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> NewData
NewData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'synapseanalytics',
	schemaName: ($SchemaName),
	tableName: ($TableName),
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkToAzureTable
